name: Project EDEN (itch)
description:
Project EDEN is an action packed boss-rush in the style of Furi and Hyper Light Drifter. The isometric, pixel-art visuals are influenced by Breath of Fire IV and Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories.

Fight hostile machines in tense, one-on-one combat and shut them down for repairs. 

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Interact: I
  • Slash/Shoot: J
  • Aim: Left Shift
  • Dodge: Space

This is the initial demo for Project EDEN.
It includes a practice room and a single boss fight.
